name: Dart Score LITE
description:
Dart Score™ is the premier cricket scoring app for the iPhone and iPod Touch. Once you score one game with Dart Score™, you'll never use the board or pen and paper again! Just tap the number you hit and Dart Score™ will mark your score. When you press the next player button, your score is saved preventing other players from modifying your hits.

▶ FEATURES
━━━━━━━
• Marks your most recent turn in red, so you can quickly see what everyone hit their last time up
• Keep a history of all games played
• Continue unfinished games
• Delete the old games you don't want to keep
• Anti-cheat features to keep your friends from messing with the scoreboard!
• Supports 1 or 2 players! Keep a history of your practice sessions!

▶ TRY BEFORE YOU BUY
━━━━━━━━━━━━
This LITE version supports 2 players only. The full version of Dart Score™ supports up to 4 players and supports scoring in 2-player mode. If you like Dart Score™ LITE, please support us and buy the full version! Also check out our other apps, iSwap Faces™ and AutoTones™!
